metadata.title: CVE-2021-30527 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in WebUI in Google Chrome prior to 91.0.4472.77 allowed anattacker who convinced a user to install a malicious extension topotentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
